title: Wizard of 2 Towers

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: > Kill someone at night or place a negative effect on someone.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> You have 2 towers. One is upgraded when you use your killing ability, one is upgraded when you use your negative effect on someone.

> If both your towers are level 2, you can use both abilities on the same night.

fields.name: Tower of Killing:
fields.value:
Level 0: Deal a Basic attack.
Level 1: Deal a Powerful attack.
Level 2: Target 2 people with kills at night.
Level 3: Your visits are astral and you can rampage at one house instead of killing 2 targets.
Level 4: Your attacks are Unstoppable
Level 5: You can rampage at 2 houses.

fields.name: Tower of Curses:
fields.value:
Level 0: Negative effects: Poison, Roleblock
Level 1: You can hear whispers and can now blackmail.
Level 2: You can now control someone or roleblock someone for 2 nights.
Level 3: You can reduce someone's defense to Vulnerable for 1 night.
Level 4: You can now make your target lose an attribute.
Level 5: You can make your own negative effects.

fields.name: Win Con:
fields.value: > Kill all who oppose you and your towers.

desc:
Post 1224
*It's a difficult choice, balance between the two towers or focus on one.*
